title: Tuning Machine Learning Parameters using scikit-learn Gridsearch
description: At Braintree we rely on scikit-learn's Pipeline and Gridsearch concepts to build and tune our predictive models. I'll talk through how this looks, the benefits, and the custom classes we've built out to augment this process to integrate Pandas dataframes.
